item.title: Israel-Gaza-Lebanon live updates: IDF confirms death of US-Israeli hostage
item.description: The Israel Defense Forces said Sunday it launched "several operations" targeting Hezbollah fighters that it claimed posed a direct threat to Israel.

item.title: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is in Ukraine for his first visit in 2 1/2 years
item.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is visiting Ukraine for the first time in more than 2 1/2 years

item.title: Democrats divided on seriousness of political issues after defeat.

item.title: Trump reacts to President Biden pardoning son Hunter before White House exit
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump reacted to President Biden pardoning his son, Hunter Biden, in a post on Truth Social on Sunday.

item.title: President Joe Biden issues pardon for son Hunter Biden
item.description: The announcement came through on Sunday evening that he had pardoned Hunter Biden.
